title: Severus workflow fails when small variants calling is disabled
body: Reported by @RhettRautsaw . When `call_small_variants` is `false` Severus will have a NULL array for the phasing VCF and thus the workflow will fail.

title: Sniffles joint calling
body:
Hello Khi,

I hope you are well. 

I am a postdoc with Sean at umccr. We had a sequencing and analysis done with you in 2023. I wanted to follow up with you about sniffles.

The joint-calling of sniffles appeared to be run per individual, not per cohort. I am wondering if you found jointing calling on normal and tumour tissues more beneficial than the entire cohort. 

Many thanks,
Min

title: Naming Conventions
body:
Hi Khi,

May I also ask about the naming conventions of the sequencing files, please?

We received a uBAM file named `<individual_id>.normal/m84039_230813_021121_s2.hifi_reads.default.bam`. What does `m84039_230813_021121_s2` denote?

Many thanks,
Min

title: Sample name in the title of the report
body:
I'd like to report that the "sample_name" in the title of the report is empty, though the parameter, sample_name, is passed as expected.
It appears that either this code below didn't work or the container has the report file that doesn't display the sample name properly.

https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/HiFi-somatic-WDL/blob/07a1799b2506d533da53a4dc4155960c721db7b7/containers/somatic_r_tools/visualize_hifisomatic.qmd#L2

title: Missing example file, input.example.json.
body:
At this page https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/HiFi-somatic-WDL/blob/main/docs/step-by-step.md#modify-the-input-json-file-to-point-to-the-downloaded-files

there is a link to an example input json but the link is dead https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/HiFi-somatic-WDL/blob/main/docs/example_configs/input.example.json

title: Slurm error - more processors requested than permitted
body:
Hi PacBio Team,

I've just downloaded the workflow and I'm trying to run it for the first time on a slurm compute cluster on the test data. I'm getting the error message for both the call-align_all_bams-0 and call-split_contigs-0 tasks:

```
srun: error: Unable to create step for job 58474048: More processors requested than permitted
```

I can't see anywhere where I can adjust the number of tasks requested in a job? Can you advise at all?
